scripts._lic: npx license-checker --json --out dist/licenses.json && npx ts-node --swc scripts/gen-licenses.ts dist/licenses.json
scripts.prebuild: npx esbuild src/xml2docx.ts --platform=node --format=cjs --bundle --sourcemap --target=node18 --metafile=dist/xml2docx.json --outfile=dist/xml2docx.cjs && npm run _lic -- dist/xml2docx-license.txt dist/xml2docx.json && node scripts/postprocess.cjs
scripts.build: npx pkg -C Brotli -t node18-win-x64 --public -o dist/xml2docx.exe dist/xml2docx.cjs
scripts.postbuild-web: npm run _lic -- web/license.html dist/web-main.json dist/web-monaco.json dist/web-worker.json
scripts.check: npx tsc -p tsconfig.json && npx eslint src
scripts.docs: npx ts-node --swc scripts/gen-docs.ts && npx ts-node --swc scripts/build-docs.ts
